channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical -- apport
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical -- apport

item.title: CVE-2021-25683|2024-08-03T20:11:27.895Z -- canonical -- apport
item.description: It was discovered that the get_starttime() function in data/apport did not properly parse the /proc/pid/stat file from the kernel.

item.title: CVE-2021-25684|2024-08-03T20:11:27.875Z -- canonical -- apport
item.description: It was discovered that apport in data/apport did not properly open a report file to prevent hanging reads on a FIFO.

item.title: CVE-2021-3710|2024-08-03T17:01:08.314Z -- canonical -- apport
item.description: An information disclosure via path traversal was discovered in apport/hookutils.py function read_file(). This issue affects: apport 2.14.1 versions prior to 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.29+esm8; 2.20.1 versions prior to 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30+esm2; 2.20.9 versions prior to 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.26; 2.20.11 versions prior to 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.20; 2.20.11 versions prior to 2.20.11-0ubuntu65.3;

item.title: CVE-2021-25682|2024-08-03T20:11:28.326Z -- canonical -- apport
item.description: It was discovered that the get_pid_info() function in data/apport did not properly parse the /proc/pid/status file from the kernel.

item.title: CVE-2021-3709|2024-08-03T17:01:08.330Z -- canonical -- apport
item.description: Function check_attachment_for_errors() in file data/general-hooks/ubuntu.py could be tricked into exposing private data via a constructed crash file. This issue affects: apport 2.14.1 versions prior to 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.29+esm8; 2.20.1 versions prior to 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30+esm2; 2.20.9 versions prior to 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.26; 2.20.11 versions prior to 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.20; 2.20.11 versions prior to 2.20.11-0ubuntu65.3;
